item.title: Jessica add a quote by Friedrich Nietzsche
item.description: "There is always some madness in love. But there is also always some reason in madness." -- Friedrich Nietzsche

item.title: Jessica add a quote by Ernesto Che Guevara
item.description: "If you tremble with indignation at every injustice then you are a comrade of mine." -- Ernesto Che Guevara

item.title: Jessica add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Great spirits have always encountered violent opposition from mediocre minds." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Jessica add a quote by Ernesto "Che" Guevara
item.description: "At the risk of seeming ridiculous, let me say that the true revolutionary is guided by a great feeling of love. It is impossible to think of a genuine revolutionary lacking this quality." -- Ernesto "Che" Guevara

item.title: Jessica add a quote by Fidel Castro
item.description: "A revolution is not a bed of roses. A revolution is a struggle between the future and the past." -- Fidel Castro

item.title: Jessica add a quote by Maya Angelou
item.description:
"I can be changed by what happens to me. But I refuse to be reduced by it.
(Popular misquote of "You may not control all the events that happen to you, but you can decide not to be reduced by them.")" -- Maya Angelou

item.title: Jessica add a quote by Stephenie Meyer
item.description: "He's like a drug for you, Bella." -- Stephenie Meyer

item.title: Jessica add a quote by Ayn Rand
item.description: "Why do they always teach us that it's easy and evil to do what we want and that we need discipline to restrain ourselves? It's the hardest thing in the world--to do what we want. And it takes the greatest kind of courage. I mean, what we really want." -- Ayn Rand

item.title: Jessica add a quote by Frank Sinatra
item.description: "Alcohol may be man's worst enemy, but the bible says love your enemy." -- Frank Sinatra

item.title: Jessica add a quote by Laura Esquivel
item.description: "[Words] cling to the very core of our memories and lie there in silence until a new desire reawakens them and recharges them with loving energy. That is one of the qualities of love that moves me most, their capacity for transmitting love. Like water, words are a wonderful conductor of energy. And the most powerful, transforming energy is the energy of love." -- Laura Esquivel

item.title: Jessica add a quote by Margaret Weis
item.description: "Words can never fully say what we want them to say, for they fumble, stammer, and break the best porcelain. The best one can hope for is to find along the way someone to share the path, content to walk in silence, for the heart communes best when it does not try to speak." -- Margaret Weis

item.title: Jessica add a quote by Paulo Freire
item.description: "The greatest humanistic and historical task of the oppressed: to liberate themselves..." -- Paulo Freire
